summary.span: 此类表示项目中传递到任务的单个项。

span.span: This class represents a single item of the project, as it is passed into a task.

summary.span: TaskItems 不与项目文件中的项元素完全对应，因为这样任务就有权访问未通过项目文件显式传递到任务的数据。

span.span: TaskItems do not exactly correspond to item elements in project files, because then tasks would have access to data that wasn't explicitly passed into the task via the project file.

summary.span: 这并不是一个安全问题，而是项目文件清晰度和透明度的问题。

span.span: It's not a security issue, but more just an issue with project file clarity and transparency.

summary.span: 注意：此类必须密封。

span.span: Note: This class has to be sealed.

summary.span: 它必须密封，因为引擎实例化它自己的此类型副本，因此，如果有人要对其进行扩展，他们不会从引擎获得所需行为。

span.span: It has to be sealed because the engine instantiates it's own copy of this type and thus if someone were to extend it, they would not get the desired behavior from the engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象与项目文件中的项元素不完全对应。 objects do not exactly correspond to item elements in project files. 如果是这样，则任务将无法访问通过项目文件显式传递到任务的数据。If they did, then tasks would have access to data that was not explicitly passed into the task through the project file. 这并不是安全问题，而是项目文件的清晰度和透明性问题。This is not a security issue, but rather an issue with project file clarity and transparency. 此类必须是密封的，因为生成引擎实例化其自己的此类型的副本。This class has to be sealed since the build engine instantiates its own copy of this type. 如果第三方正在扩展此类，则生成引擎将产生意外的行为。If a third party were to extend this class, then the build engine will yield an undesired behavior.

comment.span: 这就是创建这些实用程序的 Helpmenu：通常几个数量级的数量级小于引擎 Helpmenu 的数量。

span.span: Surprisingly few of these Utilities TaskItems are created: typically several orders of magnitude fewer than the number of engine TaskItems.

span.span: Assumes the itemspec passed in is escaped, and also that any escapable metadata values are passed in escaped form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionary CloneCustomMetadata() cil managed
abstract member CloneCustomMetadata : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionary override this.CloneCustomMetadata : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionary

summary.span: 获取自定义元数据的集合。

span.span: Get the collection of custom metadata.

summary.span: 这不包含内置元数据。

span.span: This does not include built-in metadata.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示自定义元数据的克隆。

span.span: An that represents a clone of the custom metadata.

remarks.span: 方法实现的建议准则： 1) 此方法应返回元数据2的克隆) 写入到此字典不应在基础项中反映出来。

span.span: RECOMMENDED GUIDELINES FOR METHOD IMPLEMENTATIONS: 1) this method should return a clone of the metadata 2) writing to this dictionary should not be reflected in the underlying item.

comments.span: 返回自定义元数据的非转义版本。

span.span: Returns an UNESCAPED version of the custom metadata.

comments.span: 对于转义版本 (它是在内部存储) 的，请调用 CloneCustomMetadataEscaped。

span.span: For the escaped version (which is how it is stored internally), call ITaskItem2.CloneCustomMetadataEscaped.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyMetadataTo(class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem destinationItem) cil managed
abstract member CopyMetadataTo : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem -> unit override this.CopyMetadataTo : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem -> unit

param.name: destinationItem
param.span: 要向其复制元数据的项。

span.span: The item to copy metadata to.

summary.span: 将元数据（而不是 ItemSpec）复制到 destinationItem。

span.span: Copy the metadata (but not the ItemSpec) to destinationItem.

summary.span: 如果特定的元数据已存在于目标项上，则不会被覆盖 - 原始值优先。

span.span: If a particular metadata already exists on the destination item, then it is not overwritten -- the original value wins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该元数据已存在于目标项上，则不会覆盖它。If the metadata already exists on the destination item, then it is not overwritten. 原始元数据值将取代复制的元数据值。The original metadata value supersedes the copied metadata value. 此方法不会将项规范复制到目标任务项。This method does not copy the item specification to the destination task item.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object InitializeLifetimeService() cil managed
Public Overrides Function InitializeLifetimeService () As Object

summary.span: 重写以赋予此类无限的租约时间。

span.span: Overridden to give this class infinite lease time.

summary.span: 否则，我们最终会获得一个有限的租约（大约 5 分钟），如果实例处理时间较长，就会过期。

span.span: Otherwise we end up with a limited lease (5 minutes I think) and instances can expire if they take long time processing.
to specify an infinite lifetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 否则，将产生有限的5分钟租约，如果任务实例花费很长时间进行处理，则它们会过期。Otherwise, a limited lease of 5 minutes will result; and task instances can expire if they take a long time to process.

summary.span: 获取或设置 item-spec。

span.span: Gets or sets the item-spec.
The item-spec string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项目文件中的以下项声明的为 `File.cs` 。The for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`. ```xml ```

span.span: This one is a bit tricky.

comments.span: Orcas 假定所设置的值已转义，但返回的值未转义。

span.span: Orcas assumed that the value being set was escaped, but that the value being returned was unescaped.
Maintain that behaviour here.

comments.span: 若要获取转义值，请使用 ITaskItem2. EvaluatedIncludeEscaped。

span.span: To get the escaped value, use ITaskItem2.EvaluatedIncludeEscaped.
